data.textUthmani: وَأَلْقَىٰ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ رَوَٰسِىَ أَن تَمِيدَ بِكُمْ وَأَنْهَـٰرًا وَسُبُلًا لَّعَلَّكُمْ تَهْتَدُونَ
data.wordByWord: وَأَلْقَىٰ [And He has cast] فِى [in] ٱلْأَرْضِ [the earth] رَوَٰسِىَ [firm mountains] أَن [lest] تَمِيدَ [it should shake] بِكُمْ [with you] وَأَنْهَـٰرًۭا [and rivers] وَسُبُلًۭا [and roads] لَّعَلَّكُمْ [so that you may] تَهْتَدُونَ [be guided]
data.transliteration: Waalqa fee al-ardi rawasiyaan tameeda bikum waanharan wasubulan laAAallakum tahtadoon

data.wordByWord: وَعَلَـٰمَـٰتٍۢ ۚ [And landmarks] وَبِٱلنَّجْمِ [And by the stars] هُمْ [they] يَهْتَدُونَ [guide themselves]

data.textUthmani: أَفَمَن يَخْلُقُ كَمَن لَّا يَخْلُقُ ۗ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ
data.wordByWord: أَفَمَن [Then is He Who] يَخْلُقُ [creates] كَمَن [like one who] لَّا [(does) not] يَخْلُقُ ۗ [create] أَفَلَا [Then will you not] تَذَكَّرُونَ [remember]
data.transliteration: Afaman yakhluqu kaman la yakhluquafala tathakkaroon

data.textUthmani: وَإِن تَعُدُّوا۟ نِعْمَةَ ٱللَّهِ لَا تُحْصُوهَآ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَغَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
data.wordByWord: وَإِن [And if] تَعُدُّوا۟ [you should count] نِعْمَةَ [the Favors of Allah] ٱللَّهِ [the Favors of Allah] لَا [not] تُحْصُوهَآ ۗ [you could enumerate them] إِنَّ [Indeed] ٱللَّهَ [Allah] لَغَفُورٌۭ [(is) Oft-Forgiving] رَّحِيمٌۭ [Most Merciful]
data.transliteration: Wa-in taAAuddoo niAAmata Allahi latuhsooha inna Allaha laghafoorun raheem

data.textUthmani: وَٱللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ مَا تُسِرُّونَ وَمَا تُعْلِنُونَ
data.wordByWord: وَٱللَّهُ [And Allah] يَعْلَمُ [knows] مَا [what] تُسِرُّونَ [you conceal] وَمَا [and what] تُعْلِنُونَ [you reveal]

data.textUthmani: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ لَا يَخْلُقُونَ شَيْـًٔا وَهُمْ يُخْلَقُونَ
data.wordByWord: وَٱلَّذِينَ [And those whom] يَدْعُونَ [they invoke] مِن [besides] دُونِ [besides] ٱللَّهِ [Allah] لَا [not] يَخْلُقُونَ [they create] شَيْـًۭٔا [anything] وَهُمْ [but (are) themselves] يُخْلَقُونَ [created]
data.transliteration: Wallatheena yadAAoona mindooni Allahi la yakhluqoona shay-an wahumyukhlaqoon

data.textUthmani: أَمْوَٰتٌ غَيْرُ أَحْيَآءٍ ۖ وَمَا يَشْعُرُونَ أَيَّانَ يُبْعَثُونَ
data.wordByWord: أَمْوَٰتٌ [(They are) dead] غَيْرُ [not alive] أَحْيَآءٍۢ ۖ [not alive] وَمَا [And not] يَشْعُرُونَ [they perceive] أَيَّانَ [when] يُبْعَثُونَ [they will be resurrected]
data.transliteration: Amwatun ghayru ahya-inwama yashAAuroona ayyana yubAAathoon

data.textUthmani: إِلَـٰهُكُمْ إِلَـٰهٌ وَٰحِدٌ ۚ فَٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ قُلُوبُهُم مُّنكِرَةٌ وَهُم مُّسْتَكْبِرُونَ
data.wordByWord: إِلَـٰهُكُمْ [Your god] إِلَـٰهٌۭ [(is) God] وَٰحِدٌۭ ۚ [One] فَٱلَّذِينَ [But those who] لَا [(do) not] يُؤْمِنُونَ [believe] بِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ [in the Hereafter] قُلُوبُهُم [their hearts] مُّنكِرَةٌۭ [refuse] وَهُم [and they] مُّسْتَكْبِرُونَ [(are) arrogant]
data.transliteration: Ilahukum ilahun wahidunfallatheena la yu/minoona bil-akhiratiquloobuhum munkiratun wahum mustakbiroon

data.textUthmani: لَا جَرَمَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعْلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعْلِنُونَ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلْمُسْتَكْبِرِينَ
data.wordByWord: لَا [No doubt] جَرَمَ [No doubt] أَنَّ [that] ٱللَّهَ [Allah] يَعْلَمُ [knows] مَا [what] يُسِرُّونَ [they conceal] وَمَا [and what] يُعْلِنُونَ ۚ [they reveal] إِنَّهُۥ [Indeed, He] لَا [(does) not] يُحِبُّ [love] ٱلْمُسْتَكْبِرِينَ [the arrogant ones]
data.transliteration: La jarama anna Allaha yaAAlamuma yusirroona wama yuAAlinoona innahu la yuhibbualmustakbireen

data.textUthmani: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُم مَّاذَآ أَنزَلَ رَبُّكُمْ ۙ قَالُوٓا۟ أَسَـٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
data.wordByWord: وَإِذَا [And when] قِيلَ [it is said] لَهُم [to them] مَّاذَآ [What] أَنزَلَ [has your Lord sent down] رَبُّكُمْ ۙ [has your Lord sent down] قَالُوٓا۟ [They say] أَسَـٰطِيرُ [Tales] ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ [(of) the ancient]
data.transliteration: Wa-itha qeela lahum mathaanzala rabbukum qaloo asateeru al-awwaleen

data.textUthmani: لِيَحْمِلُوٓا۟ أَوْزَارَهُمْ كَامِلَةً يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ ۙ وَمِنْ أَوْزَارِ ٱلَّذِينَ يُضِلُّونَهُم بِغَيْرِ عِلْمٍ ۗ أَلَا سَآءَ مَا يَزِرُونَ
data.wordByWord: لِيَحْمِلُوٓا۟ [That they may bear] أَوْزَارَهُمْ [their own burdens] كَامِلَةًۭ [(in) full] يَوْمَ [on (the) Day] ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ ۙ [(of) the Resurrection] وَمِنْ [and of] أَوْزَارِ [the burdens] ٱلَّذِينَ [(of) those whom] يُضِلُّونَهُم [they misled [them]] بِغَيْرِ [without] عِلْمٍ ۗ [knowledge] أَلَا [Unquestionably] سَآءَ [evil] مَا [(is) what] يَزِرُونَ [they will bear]
data.transliteration: Liyahmiloo awzarahum kamilatanyawma alqiyamati wamin awzari allatheena yudilloonahumbighayri AAilmin ala saa ma yaziroon

data.textUthmani: قَدْ مَكَرَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ فَأَتَى ٱللَّهُ بُنْيَـٰنَهُم مِّنَ ٱلْقَوَاعِدِ فَخَرَّ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلسَّقْفُ مِن فَوْقِهِمْ وَأَتَىٰهُمُ ٱلْعَذَابُ مِنْ حَيْثُ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ
data.wordByWord: قَدْ [Verily] مَكَرَ [plotted] ٱلَّذِينَ [those who] مِن [(were) before them] قَبْلِهِمْ [(were) before them] فَأَتَى [but Allah came] ٱللَّهُ [but Allah came] بُنْيَـٰنَهُم [(at) their building] مِّنَ [from] ٱلْقَوَاعِدِ [the foundations] فَخَرَّ [so fell] عَلَيْهِمُ [upon them] ٱلسَّقْفُ [the roof] مِن [from] فَوْقِهِمْ [above them] وَأَتَىٰهُمُ [and came to them] ٱلْعَذَابُ [the punishment] مِنْ [from] حَيْثُ [where] لَا [they (did) not perceive] يَشْعُرُونَ [they (did) not perceive]
data.transliteration: Qad makara allatheena min qablihimfaata Allahu bunyanahum mina alqawaAAidifakharra AAalayhimu assaqfu min fawqihim waatahumualAAathabu min haythu la yashAAuroon
